Posts.Content: RR3 wrote: i'm not sure if I even should be on this website but I cant really find a better fit place to go about me: i'm 25 years old mother of a 5 year old sufferer of hormonal imbalances family history include skin and throat cancer but not breast cancer background: basically it started when I work up with a large 5cm painful lump (the lump itself woke me up and it wasn't there 5 hours earlier) I then found 2 smaller 1cm ones in my other breast I was transfer by the GP to the breast clinic a few days later a couple of weeks later had my appointment, US + examination and questions they said it was 99% chance benign  they put me on watch and wait and now its 6 months later and the lumps are steadily growing (1mm per month) i'm now waiting for a letter from the consultant but the ultra sound technician said to expect surgery now my upper right breast has started hurting and feels hard (not a lump but the actual breast feels hard near the armpit) now i'm scared in a few days i'm due to start fertility treatment after 4 years of infertility, i've been fighting for this treatment for years and postponing isn't an option but I still havnt heard back about surgery from the breast clinic  anyone else with similar problems to any of these? 3 tumors - 1 large 6cm in left breast, 2 small 1cm in right breast - currently under watch and wait... expecting referal for partial mastectomy after steady growth Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: not sure where I fit RR3 Moderators
